content:
Baidu beats Microsoft and Google in natural language processing competition
Organizations developing natural language processing models can evaluate their models using this benchmark. Until recently, Microsoft’s MT-DNN-SMART model was at the top of GLUE leaderboard followed by Google’s T3. Now, China’s Baidu has beaten both Microsoft and Google with its ERNIE (Enhanced Representation through kNowledge IntEgration ...
MSPoweruser • 12/30/2019
What is Natural Language Processing (NLP)?
Aristo found its answers from among billions of documents using natural language processing (NLP), a branch of computer science and artificial intelligence that enables computers to extract meaning from unstructured text. Though we're still a long way from ...
PC Magazine • 12/21/2019
